This template features direct, physics-based interactions with your hands.

<b>On Desktop:</b> Use the <b>W, A, S, D</b> keys to navigate your avatar and touch the cylinder.\
<b>In XR:</b> Physically <b>reach out with your hand</b> to touch the cylinder.\
<b>Key Component:</b> The behavior for these touch events is defined in `HandsInteraction.js`.


import { DocsIFrame } from '../DocsIFrame.jsx';
import { DocsSource } from '../DocsSource.jsx';

<DocsIFrame template="2_hands"></DocsIFrame>
<DocsSource template="2_hands"></DocsSource>
<DocsSource template="2_hands" filename="HandsInteraction.js"></DocsSource>
